title: Awareness and adoption of climate-resilient practices by smallholder farmers in central and upper Eastern Kenya
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Pamellah A. Asule, Collins Musafiri, George Nyabuga, Wambui Kiai, Milka Kiboi, Gian Nicolay, Felix K. Ngetich
